title: Refund Policy
question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer a 60-day money-back guarantee on all HardChews orders. If you are not satisfied, contact our support with your order details within 60 days of purchase.

title: Shipping Time
question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Delivery time within the US is usually 3-7 business days depending on the location and carrier.
